## PHPLoaderModule type
<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
type PHPLoaderModule = {
	dependencyFilename: string;
	dependenciesTotalSize: number;
	default: (jsRuntime: string, options: EmscriptenOptions) => PHPRuntime;
};
```
<b>References:</b> [EmscriptenOptions](./php-wasm-web.emscriptenoptions.md)<!-- -->, [PHPRuntime](./php-wasm-web.phpruntime.md)
